targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu_value" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'cpu' AND "type_instance" = 'system' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu_value" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'cpu' AND "type_instance" = 'user' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu_value" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'cpu' AND "type_instance" = 'idle' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu_value" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'cpu' AND "type_instance" = 'wait' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu_value" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'cpu' AND "type_instance" = 'steal' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu_value" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'cpu' AND "type_instance" = 'nice' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu_value" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'cpu' AND "type_instance" = 'softirq' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu_value" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'cpu' AND "type_instance" = 'interrupt' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "memory_value" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'memory' AND "type_instance" = 'used' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "memory_value" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'memory' AND "type_instance" = 'cached' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "memory_value" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'memory' AND "type_instance" = 'buffered' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "memory_value" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'memory' AND "type_instance" = 'free' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "load_midterm" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'load' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "processes_value" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'ps_state' AND "type_instance" = 'sleeping' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "processes_value" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'ps_state' AND "type_instance" = 'running' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "processes_value" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'ps_state' AND "type_instance" = 'stopped' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "processes_value" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'ps_state' AND "type_instance" = 'blocked' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "processes_value" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'ps_state' AND "type_instance" = 'zombies' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "processes_value" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'ps_state' AND "type_instance" = 'paging' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT derivative(mean("value"), 1s) FROM "processes_value" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'fork_rate' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") / 3600 / 24 FROM "uptime_value" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'uptime' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "df_value" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "instance" = 'root' AND "type" = 'df_complex' AND "type_instance" = 'used' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "df_value" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "instance" = 'root' AND "type" = 'df_complex' AND "type_instance" = 'reserved' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "df_value" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "instance" = 'root' AND "type" = 'df_complex' AND "type_instance" = 'free' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "df_value" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "instance" = 'etc-hosts' AND "type" = 'df_complex' AND "type_instance" = 'used' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "df_value" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "instance" = 'etc-hosts' AND "type" = 'df_complex' AND "type_instance" = 'reserved' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "df_value" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "instance" = 'etc-hosts' AND "type" = 'df_complex' AND "type_instance" = 'free' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT derivative(mean("value"), 1s) * -1 FROM "interface_rx" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "instance" = 'eth0' AND "type" = 'if_packets' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT derivative(mean("value"), 1s) FROM "interface_tx" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "instance" = 'eth0' AND "type" = 'if_packets' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

list.name: hostname
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "docker_stats_value" WITH KEY = "host"
